1016.text: Have zero cards in your hand each time you rest.

1017.text: Lose a card to negate suffering 5 or more damage.

1018.text: Collect fewer loot tokens than any other character.

1019.text: Kill an enemy attacked by any of your allies earlier in the same round.

1020.text: Occupy a door hex adjacent to two or more enemies at the end of a round.

1021.text: Kill an enemy that has two or more negative conditions.

1022.text: Collect three or more loot tokens in the same turn.

1023.text: Kill the last enemy to die in the scenario.

1024.text: Never perform an action with a lost icon.

1025.text: Never have your hit point value drop below half your maximum hit point value (rounded up).

1026.text: Kill an enemy with an attack that would have caused at least 4 more points of damage than necessary.

1027.text: Collect more loot tokens than any other character.

1028.text: Kill an undamaged enemy with a single attack action.

1029.text: Kill an enemy with an attack that has disadvantage.

1030.text: Kill one or more elite enemies, or two or more for four characters.

1031.text: Suffer damage from an attack in the same round you long rest.

1032.text: End the scenario with a hit point value of 3 or less.

1033.text: Kill an enemy and loot the loot token it drops in the same round.

1034.text: Kill the first enemy to die in the scenario.

1035.text: Remove a negative condition from yourself or an ally two or more times.

1037.text: Never collect a loot token from end-of-turn looting.

1038.text: Never enter a hex occupied by an ally, enemy, objective, or obstacle.

1039.text: End the scenario with your hit point value equal to your maximum hit point value.

1040.text: Collect two or more loot tokens by performing a loot ability while adjacent to one or more enemies.

1041.text: Be targeted by attacks from three or more enemies in the same round.

1042.text: Never kill an elite enemy, named enemy or boss.

1044.text: Perform an ability targeting an ally before your first rest and in between each of your rests.

1045.text: End no more than three of your turns in the hex in which you started the turn, except when long resting.

1046.text: Perform two actions with lost icons in the same turn.

1047.text: Never end your turn adjacent to any other character (gain one additional %game.checkmark% for four characters).

1048.text: Kill an enemy while three or more elements are strong or waning.

1051.text: Kill an enemy not adjacent to you while you are adjacent to another enemy.

1052.text: Have one or more cards in your hand each time you rest.

1053.text: Perform a long rest while at your maximum hit point value, after you have already suffered damage.

1055.text: Have five or more total cards in your hand and discard pile at the end of the scenario.

1056.text: Apply a different negative condition to an enemy that already has one or more negative conditions.

1057.text: Lose a card to negate 2 or less damage from an attack.

1058.text: Become exhausted before any other character.

1059.text: Gain 13 or more experience before any bonus scenario experience.

1060.text: Have three or fewer total cards in your hand and discard pile while also not exhausted at the end of the scenario.

1061.text: Kill an enemy before it takes its first turn.

1062.text: Add two cards to your lost pile before your first rest.

1063.text: Never use your lowest initiative played card as your initiative card.

1064.text: Never exit a hex adjacent to an enemy except through forced movement.

1065.text: Kill one or more enemies of each monster type that appears in the scenario.

1066.text: Gain 7 or fewer experience before any bonus scenario experience.

1067.text: Never exit a room with loot tokens in it.

1068.text: Kill an enemy and open a door in the same turn, in either order.

1070.text: Perform no attack abilities in the first three rounds.

1071.text: Kill two or more enemies in the same round.

1072.text: Move no more than two hexes on each turn.

1074.text: Never attack an enemy that has already acted in the round.

1075.text: End each of your turns adjacent to a wall, obstacle, or objective.

bruiser.6: In a single scenario, across 3 consecutive rounds, play 6 different ability cards and cause enemies to suffer 7 or more damage during each of those rounds

gh2e.hint: Gloomhaven 2nd Edition currently has most of the non-scenario sections missing, as well as most of the artwork.
